name: invoiceshelf
description: InvoiceShelf is an open source invoicing, estimates and billing solution. It supports customer management, PDF invoices, taxes and discounts, with a responsive web UI intended to be self hosted for complete control of financial records.
features: Invoice Management: Create, send, and track invoices with professional templates.
Estimates and Quotes: Generate estimates that can be converted to invoices.
Customer Portal: Clients can view invoices and make payments through dedicated portal.
Tax Calculations: Automatic tax calculations with support for multiple tax rates.
Discount Management: Apply percentage or fixed discounts to line items or totals.
Payment Integration: Accept online payments through Stripe and other gateways.
Expense Tracking: Record business expenses and attach receipts.
Reporting: Generate financial reports for income, expenses, and taxes.
